nodes.documentation:
Constructor function
     * Initializes contract
nodes.name: OysterPearl

nodes.documentation: ERC20 balance function
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation: Transfers the director to a new address
nodes.name: transferDirector

nodes.documentation: Withdraw funds from the contract
nodes.name: withdrawFunds

nodes.documentation:
Permanently lock out the director to decentralize Oyster
Invocation is discretionary because Oyster might be better suited to
transition to an artificially intelligent smart contract director
nodes.name: selfLock

nodes.documentation: Director can alter the storage-peg and broker fees
nodes.name: amendClaim

nodes.documentation: Director can alter the epoch time
nodes.name: amendEpoch

nodes.documentation: Director can alter the maximum time of storage retention
nodes.name: amendRetention

nodes.documentation: Director can close the crowdsale
nodes.name: closeSale

nodes.documentation: Director can open the crowdsale
nodes.name: openSale

nodes.documentation:
Oyster Protocol Function
More information at https://oyster.ws/OysterWhitepaper.pdf
     * Bury an address
     * When an address is buried; only claimAmount can be withdrawn once per epoch
nodes.name: bury

nodes.documentation:
Oyster Protocol Function
More information at https://oyster.ws/OysterWhitepaper.pdf
     * Claim PRL from a buried address
     * If a prior claim wasn't made during the current epoch, then claimAmount can be withdrawn
     * @param _payout the address of the website owner
@param _fee the address of the broker node
nodes.name: claim

nodes.documentation: Crowdsale function
Internal transfer, can be called by this contract only
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
     * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account
     * @param _to the address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
     * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf
     * @param _spender the address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
nodes.name: approve
approveAndCall

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly
     * @param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
     * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burnFrom
